item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: GIving opening remarks at the new West Niagara Fair in Smithvile tonight at 8pm. Hope to see you all there.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Held our 10th annual constituency BBQ on Saturday. Had over 400 in attendance. Good to reconnect with so many constituents.

item.title: Mentioned by St. Catharines Standard
item.description:
Hudak vows to keep going at Niagara BBQ
Hudak spent Saturday away from Queen's Park in the familiar surroundings of his Niagara West-Glanbrook riding, hosting his 10th annual barbecue with MP Dean Allison at Cherry Avenue Farms in Vineland. As about 350 constituents gathered on the sunny ...

item.description:

item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
New Community Complex for Town of Lincoln
LINCOLN, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - April 12, 2013) - As residents cheered, Dean Allison, Member of Parliament for Niagara West-Glanbrook, and Bill Hodgson, Mayor of the Town of Lincoln, dug the first shovelful of soil to begin construction on the new Town ... and sidewalks," said MP Allison, on behalf of the Honourable Denis Lebel, Minister of Transport, Infrastructure and Communities, Minister of the Economic Development Agency of Canada for the Regions of Quebec, and Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs.

item.title: Mentioned by Bullet News Niagara
item.description:
COMMUNITY: Feds come through with cash towards construction of new Lincoln ...
... to Bullet News. LINCOLN â€“ Construction is set to begin on a new community complex in the Town of Lincoln. On Friday, Niagara West-Glanbrook MP Dean Allison lifted the first shovel of dirt during a groundbreaking ceremony held at the construction site.
